CREATE.1.1: First you need the notes file in UltraStar TXT format. If you can't find the notes file, you can create one by using an editor like these:
CREATE.1.2: Note that lyrics will be ignored.
CREATE.SONG.TITLE: Song title
CREATE.SONG.ULTRASTAR_TXT_FILE.LABEL: UltraStar TXT file
CREATE.SONG.ULTRASTAR_TXT_FILE.HELP: The notes file. Lyrics are ignored.
CREATE.SONG.ULTRASTAR_TXT_FILE.INVALID: Make sure the file is in UltraStar TXT format and it contains at least one note.
CREATE.SONG.SONG_LINK.LABEL: Link to music
CREATE.SONG.SONG_LINK.HELP: Optional link to the music where it can be played.
CREATE.SONG.LYRICS_LINK.LABEL: Link to lyrics
CREATE.SONG.LYRICS_LINK.HELP: Optional link to the song lyrics.
CREATE.SONG.LINK_AUTHOR.LABEL: Link author
CREATE.SONG.LINK_AUTHOR.HELP: Optional information about who generated this link. Name, email, company, etc.
CREATE.SONG.READY.TITLE: The link is ready!
CREATE.SONG.READY.BODY: Anyone can practice the song using this link:
ERROR.TITLE: Error ðŸ˜°
ERROR.TXT.DEFAULT: Oh no! Some error happened. Try using Google Chrome.
ERROR.MIC.TITLE: Oh no! This app cannot use your mic. Try to:
ERROR.MIC.1: make sure you have the microphone connected
ERROR.MIC.2: make sure you allowed this site to use your mic
ERROR.NOT_SUPPORTED: Yikes! It seems that this app does not work on this device and/or browser. Try Google Chrome.
FAQ.TITLE: FAQ
FAQ.MUSIC.TITLE: Where is the music?
FAQ.MUSIC.BODY: This service does not contain any music for copyright reasons. Links can be provided to play the music and to read the lyrics from other services.
FAQ.HOW_WORKS.TITLE: How does this app work?
FAQ.HOW_WORKS.BODY1: If you arrived on this site by a link that contains a melody, you can see the information about it. By pressing start you can practice singing the melody using your microphone.
FAQ.HOW_WORKS.BODY2: If you can't see any song information, you can practice singing without notes by pressing start.
FAQ.PROBLEM.TITLE: Why doesn't this app work?
FAQ.PROBLEM.BODY: Make sure that your microphone is working and you have allowed this site to use it. It's also possible that your browser does not support the technology that this app uses. Try the newest Google Chrome browser.
FAQ.PRIVACY.TITLE: How does this app handle my voice?
FAQ.PRIVACY.BODY: The app respects your privacy. Your voice is not stored and is not sent out from your browser. The app uses your mic only to detect the pitch from your singing.
FAQ.FREE.TITLE: Will this app be always free?
FAQ.FREE.BODY: Yes. This is an open source project.
SKIP.TITLE: Skip intro
SKIP.BODY: Press and hold until you start singing.
SONG.SING.TITLE: Sing it!
SONG.SING.PLAY_MUSIC: Start playing the song from the link
SONG.SING.START: Press the start button and allow using your mic
